channel.title: About on Chenyang Zhu
channel.description: Recent content in About on Chenyang Zhu

item.title: About
item.description: About Me unfinished… Self Introduction if __main__ == '__main__': print("It's Chenyang Zhu") #include <iostream>int main() { std::cout << "It's Chenyang Zhu" << std::endl; return 0; } import "fmt" func main(){ fmt.Println("It's Chenyang Zhu") } 本人本科和硕士都就读于合肥工业大学的计算机与信息学院。 硕士研究方向为：多模态抑郁症识别，深度学习方面有两篇学术论文，一段竞赛经历和在科大讯飞的实习经历。 开发方面，熟悉Python、C++、Go和Java，了解前端，熟悉计网操作系统数据库和Redis 项目：C++ Webserver、集群聊天室，MIT6.824分布式系统，牛客社区…。 Project Private Research Interest Software Development: Backend Development Computer Vision; Publications Yanrong Guo, Chenyang Zhu, Shijie Hao, Richang Hong: Automatic Depression Detection via Learning and Fusing Features From Visual Cues
